desc: Best Vegan Food Period! We offer allergen friendly cheese dips that are nut free, vegan, and allergen friendly. Using our dip is a great way to incorporate more veggies into your diet with out tasting them since it's made primarily from carrots and potatoes!

layout.text:
Nut Free, Allergy Friendly, Delicious Cheese Sauce for
Spreading, Dipping, Cooking and Snacking Together
